mapper.insert: insert into board (userid, subject, content, hit, regtime) values (#{userId}, #{subject}, #{content}, 0, now())
mapper.select:
select articleno, userid, subject, content, hit, case when date_format(regtime, '%Y%m%d') = date_format(now(), '%Y%m%d') then date_format(regtime, '%H:%i:%s') else date_format(regtime, '%y.%m.%d') end regtime from board
order by articleno desc limit #{start}, #{spp}
